fullplot: Having left New Hampshire over excessive demands by the locals, the cast and crew of "The Old Mill" moves their movie shoot to a small town in Vermont. However, they soon discover that The Old Mill burned down in 1960, the star can't keep his pants zipped, the starlet won't take her top off, and the locals aren't quite as easily conned as they appear.
plot: A movie crew invades a small town whose residents are all too ready to give up their values for showbiz glitz.
title: State and Main

tomatoes.consensus: State and Main offers plenty of wit and laughs in its lampoons of the movie industry.
